Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: ANZ Travel Visa Signature Credit Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Earn 1.4 air miles for every S$1 spent locally and 2.8 air miles for every S$1 spent with contactless payment.
Earn 2.8 air miles for every S$1 spend on direct bookings with Qantas and Jetstar airlines or retail spend in Australia and New Zealand.
Receive 10,000 air miles upon annual card renewal.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: 2,000 bonus miles

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Minimum spend of at least S$500 using ANZ Travel Visa Signature Card within 30 days of card approval is required
2. Promotion period from 1 November 2016 - 29 February 2016. Receive application approval from bank by 15th March 2015.
3. Only applicable to New-to-Bank customers.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: The 2.8 air miles promotion is limited to 14,000 Travel$ per Principal Cardmember per calendar month.
The annual renewal bonus gift of 10,000 air miles is valid for Cardmembers who renew and pay their annual fee from the 2nd year of membership onwards.

Details.Name: sc_airmiles_details
Details.Feature: Complimentary travel and accident insurance coverage of up to S$1 million
Unlimited complimentary access to Airport Lounges around the world
$1 = 1.4 air miles for local spend
$1 = 2.8 air miles for spend in Australia and New Zealand or on flights with Qantas and Jetstar
Complimentary airport limousine transfers

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: $1 = 1.4 miles on all spend
Enjoy exclusive offers from Visa Signature privileges, ANZ Spot and Dining privileges
Get up to 25% off at Singapore Marriott Tang Plaza Hotel, Silk Road Restaurant, Outback Steakhouse, MELT - The World Cafe and many more

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: Up to 17.0% savings on S$500 ANZ StarCash prepaid card for refuel at Caltex service station
Up to 12.7% savings at Caltex ($3 off every $50 gross petrol spend (Valid till 30 Sep 2016) + 5% site discount + Caltex Thanks! points + ANZ Travel$)

Details.Feature: ./images/ANZ Travel Visa Signature Credit Card.png
